https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wsxH3PSD091tEJCmmW21uxr0P8f.jpg An exciting documentary following in the footsteps of Edgar Allan Poe to discover the mystery behind the man who wrote such classics as "The Raven," "The Tell-Tale Heart," "The Black Cat," and countless others. Edgar Allan Poe: Master of the Macabre
